Entries.GiftReaction_Golden_Pumpkin: ...!$7#$b#This is so rare! @, are you sure you want to give this to me!?$7#$b#Wow... Thank you so much!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Magic_Rock_Candy: Ooh, rock candy! How'd you know I love this stuff?$h#$b#*crunch* Yummy!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Prismatic_Shard: ...!$7#$b#This is so rare! @, are you sure you want to give this to me!?$7#$b#Wow... Thank you so much!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Amethyst: How did you know this is my favorite gemstone?$h#$b#Thanks, @!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Blackberry_Cobbler: This looks delicious! Thank you!$h#$b#Hey, aren't blackberries out of season right now? How did you even get this?$k
Entries.GiftReaction_Pumpkin: Oh, thanks! This will make a tasty pie -- and a great jack-o-lantern. Heehee!$h
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-80: For me? *sniff* It smells so nice! Thank you.$h
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-2: This is a really expensive gift for someone you barely know...$k#$b#But I appreciate it!$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Life_Elixir: Hey, I can use this to--$h#$b#Um...$k#$b#To recharge during that afternoon slump. Yeah. Thanks!$h#$e#Don't worry about what I said. Haha.$h
Entries.GiftReaction_Bread: Is this... an entire loaf of bread? Um, okay...?$0
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-19: Ugh, that smell--! Why would you give me a bag of smelly dirt!?$a
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-4: Is this a whole raw fish? Gross.$a
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-74: Uh, I'm really not a gardener. This is pretty wasted on me.$s
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-20: This is literally garbage. What's wrong with you?$a

Entries.GiftReaction_Blackberry_Cobbler: This looks delicious! Thank you!$h#$b#Gosh, it's so fresh... It's still warm!$h

Entries.GiftReaction_Chocolate_Cake: Ooh! I was just having a chocolate craving!$h#$b#You're not a mind reader, are you? Haha.$h
Entries.GiftReactionCategory_-6: Did this come from one of your animals? That's nice. Thanks.$k

Entries.GiftReaction_Rabbit's_Foot: So if I carry this with me, I'll get lucky?$h#$b#...$l#$b#Nevermind. Thanks.$l

Entries.wedding: Your wedding was beautiful! I'm so happy for you and %spouse!$h
Hmph.$a#$b#I hope this marriage goes better than ours did.$u#$b#For %spouse's sake.$s
Entries.luauBest: Just because the soup put me in a good mood doesn't mean I want to talk to you.$a
Entries.divorce: You're quite the heartbreaker, aren't you?$a
It's bad enough you hurt me -- you have to hurt my friends, too!?$a
